title: Get rid of null Variables
body_html:
Currently, when a user passes in None where a Variable is represented, this is represented C++ level as a nullptr Variable shared pointer. This is irritating and adds a lot of extra checks / special cases where we shouldn't need them. A better strategy is to represented these as Variables, whose tensor data are an undefined tensor.

CC @apaszke
